citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
Availability of records. At the time of the inspection, the documents/records that are required under the AWA (the written
Program of Veterinary Care, Contingency Plan, and the animal records) were unavailable. As a result, these documents
could not be reviewed during the inspection.
Per this Section. all documents and records that are required to be kept under the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) should be
available at the time of an inspection so the documents can be reviewed to determine the facility's compliance with the
provisions of the AWA. Correct from this date 8/21/25 forward
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representative.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
Availability of records. At the time of the inspection, the documents/records that are required under the AWA (the written 
Program of Veterinary Care, Contingency Plan, and the animal records) were unavailable. As a result, these documents 
could not be reviewed during the inspection.  
 
Per this Section. all documents and records that are required to be kept under the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) should be 
available at the time of an inspection so the documents can be reviewed to determine the facility's compliance with the 
provisions of the AWA. Correct from this date 8/21/25 forward 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representative.  
 
*END OF REPORT*
